text:
hi,

on my client (linux mint 20), syncthing 1.7.1 package is not available through update manager since the release, i am with the 1.6.1 version

though, my server still got the last update 1.7.1 yesterday (raspbian buster)

the result is that i cant connect to the server since yesterday because of usual version conflict


 - client syncthing version installed : 1.6.1
- server syncthing version installed : 1.7.1
- os : linux mint 20 ulyana.

apt-get update & apt upgrade doesnt show any new version of syncthing
